website_summaries.verdict: Nike introduced another streetwear version of their classic running silhouette, the Air Huarache. The Nike Air Huarache Drift has reviews that boast about its comfort and durability without surrendering its affordability.It also highlights its authenticity to its running heritage by displaying a sporty vibe and keeping it lightweight. This sneaker is highly suggested to buyers looking for a great pair of sneakers with great value.
pros: The Nike Air Huarache Drift is offered at an affordable price range
A large percentage of the respondents praise the overall comfort the Nike Air Huarache Drift provides on feet
The durability of this sneaker is remarkable, said few wearers
Some users share that they use their Air Huarache Drift for the gym, running, playing light sports, and for casual events
Many respondents love the stylish and eye-catching design of this model that receives compliments even from strangers
Several buyers enjoy the lightness of this model
cons: One user has complained that the Nike Air Huarache Drift is hard to put on because the entry is a tad small and the material used is not that stretchy
Another user has griped that the cushioning of this kick is insufficient

customer_reviews.title: Running Hurraches
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable pair of sneakers I've worn. There is no tongue it fits like a sock with maximum comfort. I could run to the moon in skywalkers.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Inguaggiato

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sneaker
customer_reviews.text: The shoe silhouette is amazing I order an size 8 but the first day they fit very tight, you need to use it at least the first 3-4 days in a row so it can adapt to your foot. However wen they adapt they are very comfortable and was good price. I love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sketch
customer_reviews.text: I read the q&a and it said they would come with the Strap and they did not also I paid $89 and when They came in had a price tag on the box for $62.99 pretty messed up
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers were great a bit narrower than other shoes. But otherwise my son loved it.. no complaints. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the shoe except that it's coming apart on the outter sole. I had to pull the grip all the way off because it was coming off in flaps. Never had a pair of Nikes fall apart like this!
customer_reviews.author: BarbaRoja

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I would buy again. I bought first one from a store and a year or two later I bought one on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Deepika Trivedi

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes were damaged and arrived with a hole on the side of the shoe.... given the price we paid, I am very disappointed on how they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany George

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair. Thanks! Shipping was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hogie

customer_reviews.title: Patron their business
customer_reviews.text: Thought maybe I was going to be swindled with some fake Nike’s haha. But they were just what I ordered, fit great, color was great, price was great etc. I will probably be purchasing another pair because I want to wear these all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peoples

customer_reviews.title: The newer shoe is bettwe
customer_reviews.text: Wouldnt order again not for the price difference at the store
customer_reviews.author: Esaias Tecle

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Order bigger than you normally would but I like the sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Sean McGough

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great shoe , it was way more comfortable that I would have thought and they looked and felt fresh ! The shoe box looked like it’s been tossed around during shipping but other than that I was highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Little tighter the first few days, comfortable and light, inside bottoms not the best, kind of cheap looking,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So great people be careful they might get stolen
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and fitmemt my last pair were stolen it was a great shoe wouldve still had the shoes but the got stolen
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came apart in under 30 days. I bought another pair thinking it was defective & nope 2nd pair did the same thing. Not worth the time nor money.
customer_reviews.author: Worlds S.

customer_reviews.title: Great with lounge and running shorts
customer_reviews.text: Soft material but very light for walking and running. Great style and comfort. Strictly for walking and running
customer_reviews.author: True review man

customer_reviews.title: Strips
customer_reviews.text: Hey. they should have come with black stripes on top of the sneaker, on which Nike should be written, but they were not
customer_reviews.author: Alexender perdew

customer_reviews.title: Not a work shoe
customer_reviews.text: I work long hours (10 to 14) at work and thought these shoes would be good however they don't really seem to have much support. The shoes do look nice but I wouldn't be in them more than I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Stained
customer_reviews.text: I liked how how fast it got here but they were stained so I’d give it a 1 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: CoolCarlos

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come in original Nike box? Didn’t get strap that goes across shoe. Maybe shoe not real Nike
customer_reviews.author: watchcollector

customer_reviews.title: My new fav Nike running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit!! So comfortable... Every step is like walking on a cloud... I would highly recommend these shoes!! I’m a chick but loved this color did research to find the man / women size differences.... if you wear a 10 in women’s order an 8 in men’s ... That’s what I did anyways because women huaraches don’t come in that color scheme that I could find.. worth the money spent for sure...
customer_reviews.author: GeminiGirl

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug, don’t underestimate your size. Whatever your standard nike size is stick with it. Looks amazing and the bone color doesn’t stain easily. Couldn’t be happier with these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really!! This sucks......
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was missing the the strap on one of the shoes. The strap goes straight across the top no way they shouldn’t have seen it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Howard

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly well a lil tight at the toe buh good
customer_reviews.author: Michael
